definition: to make fit for, or change to suit a new purpose
details:
verb
- to make fit for, or change to suit a new purpose
= example: to make fit for, or change to suit a new purpose
= synonyms: adapt
- to make one thing compatible with another
= example: to make one thing compatible with another
= synonyms: reconcile, conciliate
- to provide a service or favor for someone
= example: to provide a service or favor for someone
= synonyms: oblige
- to provide with something desired or needed
= example: to provide with something desired or needed
- to provide housing for
= example: to provide housing for
= synonyms: house
- to be agreeable or acceptable to
= example: to be agreeable or acceptable to
= synonyms: suit
- to have room for
= example: to have room for
= synonyms: hold
